ModMetaData.name: Hire Empire
ModMetaData.author: Broms
ModMetaData.description:
Taking advantage of the system to hire pirates set up in Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates. I have added the empire as a group you can hire from.
Empire: Common Laborer: 30 silver a day. Great with mining, construction, animals, and planting. Mid range skill in all four. Noble: 100 silver a day. Good for researching and other intellectual tasks. Between 8 and 13 Intellectual Skill Cataphract: 150 silver a day. Heavily armed ranged soldier. Between 8-12 Shooting Skill.
04/22/2022 Update: --- Under Mod Options: Vanilla Framework Expanded -> Toggle-able Patches ---
Defaults to Off (False): Optional Low class laborer: 5 silver a day. Cheap laborer fit for cleaning and hauling. Between 1-4 skills.
Requires Vanilla Expanded Framework as it uses their hiring code. Also obviously requires Royalty DLC.
